text: Interested parties shall have 30 days after the mailing or publication of the notice under § 42-3173.05, whichever is later, to take sufficient action.
historical:
Legislative History of Laws

For Law 14-114, see notes following § 42-3171.01.

DC CODE § 42-3173.06

Current through December 11, 2012

chapter.text: Quick Acquisition of Abandoned and Nuisance Property.
